divs: Sighting Detailsthis thing is hovering in the sky right now south east from my house looks like it near allen park area prolly a lil futher than that but its hovering for sure i cant tell if its disked shap but all i know is its not a star plane or helicopter its not making any trail just flashing and also seen one in gibrater different very big when i was in Gibraltar area to the north this one was hugghh and red at 930 pm and disappated like nothing ive ever seen it was about a mile or two across
